_meanings:
{@--2@} 
Following every word; {#°sUtraM#} a 
commentary (of a Brāhmaṇa) 
explaining the text word for word.

A chorus,
burden of a song or words sung
again at regular intervals.

{@--1@} Along the feet, near
the feet; {#anupadaM badDA anupadInA#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--2@} Step by step, at every step;  

<ls>Śi. 9. 78.</ls>
